B+tree

B+tree Operation : Deletion

  • Function delete(value K, pointer P)
    • (K,Â P)(K,~P)(K,Â P)ë¥¼ í¬í•¨í•˜ëŠ” leaf node LLLì„ íƒìƒ‰
    • delete_entry(L, K, P) í˜¸ì¶œ
function delete(value K, pointer P)
    find the leaf node L that contains (K, P)
    delete_entry(L, K, P)
  • Function delete_entry(node N, value K, pointer P)
    • NNNì—ì„œ (K,Â P)(K,~P)(K,Â P) ì œê±°
    • If (NNNì´ rootì´ê³  NNNì´ í•˜ë‚˜ì˜ childë§Œ ê°€ì§ˆ ê²½ìš°)
      • NNNì˜ childë¥¼ treeì˜ ìƒˆ rootë¡œ ì„¤ì •í•˜ê³  NNNì„ ì‚­ì œ
    • Else if (NNNì´ ë„ˆë¬´ ì ì€ value/pointerë¥¼ ê°€ì§ˆ ê²½ìš°)
      • Nâ€²N'Nâ€²ì„ parent(N)ì˜ ì´ì „ ë˜ëŠ” ë‹¤ìŒ childë¡œ ì„¤ì •
      • Kâ€²K'Kâ€²ì„ parent(N)ì—ì„œ NNNê³¼ Nâ€²N'Nâ€² pointer ì‚¬ì´ì˜ valueë¡œ ì„¤ì •
      • If (NNNê³¼ Nâ€²N'Nâ€²ì˜ entriesê°€ ë‹¨ì¼ nodeì— ë§ì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” ê²½ìš°) /* Coalesce nodes */
        • ...

function delete_entry(node N, value K, pointer P)
    remove (K, P) from N
    if (N is the root and N has only one remaining child)
        then make the child of N the new root of the tree and delete N
    else if (N has too few values/pointers) then begin
        Let N' be the previous or next child of parent(N)
        Let K' be the value between pointers N and N' in parent(N)
  • NNNì—ì„œ entry (K,Â P)(K,~P)(K,Â P)ë¥¼ ì œê±°
  • NNNì´ entry ì œê±° í›„ underflow (ë„ˆë¬´ ì ì€ ìˆ˜ì˜ value/pointer) ìƒíƒœì¸ì§€ í™•ì¸
  • Underflow ìƒíƒœë¼ë©´, parent(N)ì—ì„œ NNNì˜ í˜•ì œ node N' (ì´ì „ ë˜ëŠ” ë‹¤ìŒ)ì™€ ê·¸ ì‚¬ì´ì˜ key Kâ€²K'Kâ€²ë¥¼ ì°¾ìŒ
        if (entries in N and N' can fit in a single node)
            then begin /* Coalesce nodes */
                if (N is a predecessor of N' ) then swap_variables(N, N')
                if (N is not a leaf)
                    then append K' and all pointers and values in N to N'
                else append all (K_i, P_i) pairs in N to N' ; set N'.P_n = N.P_n
                delete_entry(parent(N), K', N); delete node N
            end
  • delete_entryì˜ Coalesce nodes (ë³‘í•©) ê³¼ì •
    • if (N is a predecessor of N') ...: ì œì¼ ì™¼ìª½ nodeì¼ ê²½ìš° ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ í˜•ì œ nodeì™€ swap
    • if (N is not a leaf) ...: í˜•ì œ nodeì— ì´ì •í‘œê°€ ë˜ëŠ” Kâ€²K'Kâ€² ê°’ì„ ì‚½ì…í•˜ê³  ìì‹ ì˜ key ê°œìˆ˜ë§Œí¼ í˜•ì œ nodeì— keyê°’ê³¼ pointerë¥¼ ì‚½ì…. ì˜®ê²¨ì§„ pointerë“¤ì´ ì°¸ì¡°í•˜ëŠ” nodeë“¤ì˜ ë¶€ëª¨ nodeëŠ” ëª¨ë‘ í˜•ì œ nodeë¥¼ ê°€ë¦¬ì¼œì•¼ í•¨
    • else (N is a leaf) ...: í˜•ì œ nodeì— Kâ€²K'Kâ€² ê°’ ì‚½ì… ê³¼ì •ì„ ìƒëµí•˜ê³ , ìì‹ ì˜ key ê°œìˆ˜ë§Œí¼ í˜•ì œ nodeì— keyê°’ê³¼ pointerë¥¼ ì‚½ì…í•œ ë‹¤ìŒ ë§ˆì§€ë§‰ pointerê°€ ìì‹ ì´ ê°€ë¦¬í‚¤ë˜ í˜•ì œ nodeë¥¼ ê°€ë¦¬í‚¤ë„ë¡ í•¨
        else begin /* Redistribution: borrow an entry from N' */
            if (N' is a predecessor of N) then begin
                if (N is a nonleaf node) then begin
                    let m be such that N'.P_m is the last pointer in N'
                    remove (N'.K_{m-1},~N'.P_m ) from N'
                    insert (N'.P_m,~K' ) as the first pointer and value in N,
                         by shifting other pointers and values right
                    replace K' in parent(N) by N'.K_{m-1}
                end
                else begin
                    let m be such that (N'.P_m,~N'.K_m ) is the last pointer/value pair in N'
                    remove (N'.P_m,~N'.K_m) from N'
                    insert (N'.P_m,~N'.K_m ) as the first pointer and value in N,
                         by shifting other pointers and values right
                    replace K' in parent(N) by N'.K_m
                end
            end
            else ... symmetric to the then case ...
        end
    end
  • delete_entryì˜ Redistribution (ì¬ë¶„ë°°) ê³¼ì •
    • if (N' is a predecessor of N) ê²½ìš° (ì™¼ìª½ í˜•ì œ node N'ì—ì„œ ë¹Œë ¤ì˜¤ëŠ” ê²½ìš°)
      • if (N is a nonleaf node) ...: NNN nodeì˜ keyê°’ê³¼ pointer ë°°ì—´ ê°’ì„ í•œ ì¹¸ì”© ë’¤ë¡œ ë¯¸ë£¸. NNNì˜ pointer[0]ì´ ì™¼ìª½ í˜•ì œ nodeì—ì„œ ì œì¼ ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ì— ìœ„ì¹˜í•œ pointerê°€ ê°€ë¦¬í‚¤ë˜ ìì‹ nodeë¥¼ ê°€ë¦¬í‚¤ë„ë¡ í•˜ê³  ë¶€ëª¨ node ì¬ì„¤ì •. (ì§ˆë¬¸) ë§Œì•½ nodeê°€ ì´ë¯¸ ì œì¼ ì™¼ìª½ì¸ ìƒíƒœì—ì„œ Key Rotationì„ í•´ì•¼í•˜ëŠ” ìƒí™©ì´ë¼ë©´?
